隁字的基本解释

隁
yàn
古同“堰”，挡水的低坝。

隁
yǎn
山坡。

隁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》於扇切，去線，影。］
亦作“墕1”。“偃2”的今字。亦作“隁1”。
(1)挡水的低坝。
(2)田边用以分界或防止水土流失的埂子。
[②]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》於建切，去願，影。］
［《廣韻》於幰切，上阮，影。］
筑堰堵塞。

隁字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　隁； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1356第06
【集韻】於建切，音漹。【玉篇】以畜水也。【集韻】本作堰，亦作?。障水也。　又【集韻】隱幰切，音偃。阪也。　又人名。【前漢·藝文志】陽丘侯劉隁賦十九篇。【師古註】隁音偃。

隁字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
隁字的起名意思

暂无。

隁
Basic explanation of words
隁
yàn
Gutong "Weir", a low dam for retaining water.
隁
yǎn
hillside.
隁
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàn］
["Guang Yun" cuts in fan, removes lines, and shadows. ]
Also known as "墕1". The present character of "Yan 2". Also known as "Jun 1".
(1) A low dam for retaining water.
(2) A ridge used to demarcate or prevent soil erosion at the edge of the field.
[②]［yǎn］
["Guang Yun" Yu Jianqie, Qu Yuan, Ying. ]
["Guang Yun" Yu Jiaqie, Shang Ruan, Ying. ]
The weir is blocked.
隁
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【Fu Character Department】　隁; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1356 Page 06
[Jiyun] Yu Jianqie, Yinchuan. 【Jade articles】It is also based on animal water. [Ji Yun] This is used as weir, but also as ?. Barriers to water also.　[Jiyun] Hidden and cut, sound is 偃. Sakaya.　Another name. 【Pre-Han · Art and Literature History】Nineteen Fus from Yangqiu Hou Liu Jun. 【Shigu Note】Kuan Yinyan.
